H0.text: In Imperial measurement, how many pounds are there in a hundredweight. 100

H1.text: In Imperial measurement, how many pounds are there in a hundredweight. 96

H2.text: In Imperial measurement, how many pounds are there in a hundredweight. 120

H3.text: In Imperial measurement, how many pounds are there in a hundredweight. 112

A4.text: The long or imperial hundredweight of 8 stone or 112 pounds (50.80 kg) is defined in the British imperial system.

A5.text: Under both conventions, there are 20 hundredweight in a ton, producing a long ton of 2,240 pounds.
